The Facts of this case albeit briefly are as follows.
According to PW1 - the victim of this case, he had been about 17 years old
when he faced this  bitter ordeal. When he gave evidence, he was 21 years
old. During the time period relevant to this case, when PW1 was attending
some duties in the temple, the Appellant being a priest in the temple, called
the victim to his room to give some bananas. On that pretext, when the victim
went to the Appellant’s room, he had been sexually abused by the Appellant
by firstly performing anal intercourse and secondly performing oral sex on
him. When the Appellant performed the anal intercourse, the victim had felt
severe pain. The victim further said that he only realised that he had been
deceived when he went to the Appellant’s room.
